item.title: How to install OpenVPN on BeagleBone Black
Installing node-sqlite3 on BeagleBone Black
item.description: To install node-sqlite3 on BeagleBone Black, first install the latest version of npm: npm install -g npm Then install the node-sqlite3 module: npm install -g sqlite3 Note the -g flag used to install system wide. To install locally don’t use the -g flag. Npm must be updated because the version that comes with BeagleBone Black fails comparing Python version when installing compiled packages.
